channel.title: Comments on: Not so Frequently Asked Questions site down

item.title: By: hagen
item.dc:creator: hagen
item.description: Thanks for mirroring, I have updated my links to your site.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for mirroring, I have updated my links to your site.

item.title: By: amigniox
item.dc:creator: amigniox
item.description: I've mirrored the contents on my site: http://www.ualberta.ca/~xz10/gnuplot/index-e.html useful stuff...can't afford losing it...
item.content:encoded:
I’ve mirrored the contents on my site:
http://www.ualberta.ca/~xz10/gnuplot/index-e.html
useful stuff…can’t afford losing it…

item.title: By: J A Brown
item.dc:creator: J A Brown
item.description: He really needs to either publish it as a pdf/ebook - or mirror it.
item.content:encoded: He really needs to either publish it as a pdf/ebook – or mirror it.

item.title: By: hagen
item.dc:creator: hagen
item.description: I'm in contact with him. He is looking for a solution at the moment. The whole content of the site is save and he is looking for a way to host it.
item.content:encoded: I’m in contact with him. He is looking for a solution at the moment. The whole content of the site is save and he is looking for a way to host it.

item.title: By: Wojtek
item.dc:creator: Wojtek
item.description: I second that, without that website, we're lost. Is prof. Kawano doing fine?
item.content:encoded: I second that, without that website, we’re lost. Is prof. Kawano doing fine?

item.title: By: ben
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Any idea why? It's a steadfast for me that site.
item.content:encoded:
Any idea why?
It’s a steadfast for me that site.
